Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[ExtraAssetsIm: Load the custom surfaces, take effect after restarting the game.
Load the custom decals, take effect after restarting the game.

This setting have for goal to try to fix missing prefab caused by EAI update. To use it is simple, enable the setting corresponding to the version of the mod you have used in your save, restart the game, load your save check if the missing prefabs are back and if nothing is wrong. If nothing is wrong save your save and restart the game, if there is wrong stuff quit the game without saving. This setting automatically disable itself after the restart to avoid future conflict and issue.
Delete the asset files from the disk if they haven't been loaded (for example, disabled mod).
Delete the database when you close the game, useful when uninstalling the mod.
